item.title: Leg Ulcer
item.description: Leg Ulcer # Ulcer - loss of area of epidermis and dermis to produce a defect even down to fat, muscle, tendons and bone

item.title: Pyoderma Gangrenosum
item.description: Pyoderma Gangrenosum # Pyoderma gangrenosum is a rare skin condition that causes painful ulcers. It’s usually treatable but can take some time to heal and may leave some scarring.

item.title: Systemic Lupus Erythematosus
item.description: Systemic Lupus Erythematosus # Anti-DNA reaction so can present in any system Causes/Factors # Symptoms # Signs # Diagnostic Tests # Management # Complications/red Flags #
